name: Collared T-Shirt
description: A classic and versatile short-sleeved shirt. Available in a variety of colors and prints, perfect for everyday wear.

name: Crew Neck Solid Color T-Shirt
description: A comfortable and versatile t-shirt. Great for layering or wearing on its own in cooler weather.

name: Polo Shirt
description: A collared shirt with a two- or three-button placket. A more polished option than a t-shirt, suitable for casual or slightly dressy occasions.

name: Button-Down Stripe Shirt
description: A more formal shirt with a full button closure down the front.  Can be worn with dress pants or jeans for a variety of occasions.

name: Versatile Crew Neck Shirt
description: A comfortable and casual shirt with a crew neck and a button placket at the neckline. Great for layering or wearing on its own.

name: Leaf Print Shirt
description: A t-shirt with a graphic design or message on the front. Can be a fun way for boys to express their interests.
